page.title: 10Leisure time around Sanquhar
page.content: For a town of its size Sanquhar has a great number of leisure facilities for all ages. For children, there are the usual organisations- Brownies and Girl Guides, Boys' Brigade and Youth Clubs. There are many other bodies which are keen to allow children to join and to make use of their facilities. The town has a Golf Club, Bowling Green, an athletics club and a curling club, and they encourage youths to participate. Other societies deal with karate, fishing, badminton and football. For the less energetic, there are clubs for public-speaking, wine-making, crook-making, fly-tying, keep fit and yoga. There are clubs which are run by the churches for their congregations and a few self-help organisations. Other societies include the local Silver Band and Horticultural Society. All these clubs are going concerns.
